about.description: We are a specialized medical center providing the latest complementary medicine and non-surgical aesthetic techniques. Our team of specialized doctors ensures you get the best results with the highest standards of safety and quality.
about.missionText: To provide distinguished medical services that combine modern medicine with advanced techniques to ensure the comfort and safety of our patients.
about.visionText: To be the leading reference in complementary medicine and non-surgical aesthetics in the region.

aboutPage.title: About Us
aboutPage.subtitle: Al-Najah Center for Complementary Medicine is a specialized medical institution providing complementary and natural treatments using the latest scientifically proven techniques and methods to ensure you get the best results
aboutPage.missionText: We strive at Al-Najah Center to provide comprehensive and advanced healthcare by integrating modern medical sciences with complementary and alternative medicine, to provide our patients with natural, safe and effective therapeutic solutions.
aboutPage.missionDesc: We believe that true health is achieved through the balance between body, mind and spirit, so we provide comprehensive treatments that focus on the person as a whole and not just on symptoms.
aboutPage.visionText: To be the leading center in the region in the field of complementary and natural medicine, and contribute to improving the quality of life of our patients by providing the best therapeutic services
aboutPage.teamSubtitle: A team of doctors and specialists with extensive experience in complementary medicine
aboutPage.ctaTitle: Start Your Journey to Health and Wellness
aboutPage.ctaSubtitle: Book a free consultation with our experts and discover how complementary medicine can improve your health

beforeAfter.title: Success Stories and Amazing Results!
beforeAfter.description: At Al-Najah Center, we believe that every treatment journey is a success story worth telling. This section is dedicated to showcasing inspiring success stories and successful treatment results that we have witnessed and had the honor of contributing to. Through these stories, we want to share with you the wonderful transformation moments that our clients have achieved thanks to our dedication to providing the best care and treatments.
beforeAfter.afterDescription: After treatment: Significant improvement after a series of topical and light treatments, with clearer and more radiant skin.
beforeAfter.beforeDescription: Before treatment: Skin with clear acne, which led to inflammation and pimples
